xxIcon Previewer for Artists and Developersxx
为艺术家和开发者设计的图标预览器
給美工與開發者用的圖示預覽器

description.p: Icon Explorer allows artists and developers to preview and pick icons. Icon Explorer attempts to render the icons exactly as they would look drawn in the application. It allows to filter based on category and name. Icon Explorer is not a general-purpose tool, but geared towards artists' and developers' use-cases. Icon Explorer also provides a plugin for Kate and KDevelop to be used as icon picker.
